Posts.Content: last week i had a mammogram and i got the report in the mail today, it says i need to contact my dr. for further evaluation and to have special views and /or ultrasound/or mri for an area of your breast(s) for further assessment. now i'm worried. it's been 10 years since my last mammogran, i know i should not have waited so long. i don't feel any lumps. i am 55 years old, my grandmother died from breast cancer. are there any signs i should look for?
Posts.Title: just got mammogram report
